short_summary: Renovation of 5 individual apartments, including painting, drywall, ceilings, flooring, kitchens, heating systems, and bathrooms in the Temple Housing building in Lake Louise town site.
description: This is a multi-project construction order for the renovation of five individual apartments, including painting, drywall, ceilings, flooring, kitchens, heating systems and bathrooms, and repair of all water damaged sections in walls, floors ceilings, insulation at the Temple Housing building in Lake Louise town site. This is a multi-project construction order for the renovation of five individual apartments, including painting, drywall, ceilings, flooring, kitchens, heating systems and bathrooms, and repair of all water damaged sections in walls, floors ceilings, insulation at the Temple Housing building in Lake Louise town site. The estimated value of the project is between $100,001 and $250,000, inclusive of tax. The project is expected to be completed by March 15, 2023.
